price: Isipo kuwa waja wa Mwenyezi Mungu walio safishwa.
footnotes: Lakini waja wa Mwenyezi Mungu walio khitariwa wakasafishwa hawana makosa ya huo uzushi wa makafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
